ai-thag10.6:1.1_0: In order to go on retreat,
ai-thag10.6:1.2_0: a monk should stay in lodgings
ai-thag10.6:2.1_0: Having gathered scraps from rubbish heaps,
ai-thag10.6:2.3_0: and making an outer robe from them,
ai-thag10.6:2.4_0: one should wear that coarse robe.
ai-thag10.6:3.2_0: a mendicant should walk for alms
ai-thag10.6:3.4_0: my sense-doors are guarded and well restrained;
ai-thag10.6:4.1_0: They should be content even with coarse food,
ai-thag10.6:4.3_0: The mind that’s greedy for flavors
ai-thag10.6:6.1_0: Like a goose, like a trick,
ai-thag10.6:6.3_0: an astute person would not speak overly long
ai-thag10.6:7.1_0: But when the poised one does not flee.
ai-thag10.6:8.1_0: Expert in the arising of thought,
ai-thag10.6:8.3_0: They would be devoted to practicing
ai-thag10.6:8.4_0: serenity and discernment at the right time.
ai-thag10.6:9.1_0: Accomplished in energy, endowed with energy,
ai-thag10.6:9.3_0: a wise person would not be too sure of themselves,
ai-thag10.6:9.4_0: until they have attained the end of suffering.
ai-thag10.6:10.1_0: For a mendicant who meditates in this way,
